directions: Melt butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Stir in flour, then add broth, cream, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Mix together and cook until thickened. Stir in chicken, peas and almonds. Heat through and serve over hot cooked biscuits.
ingredients: 3 cups cooked, chopped chicken breast meat
2 cups frozen green peas, thawed and drained
title: Creamed Chicken for Biscuits
